choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for 7 days.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews

### Response:


Sure! Here is a sample meal plan for you for the next seven days without dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews:

Day 1:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with fresh berries and walnuts (without almond milk)
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with steamed vegetables (without soy sauce)
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and quinoa (without garlic)

Day 2:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and granola
- Lunch: Tuna salad sandwich with whole wheat bread and avocado
- Dinner: Black bean soup with a side of cornbread (without honey or almonds)

Day 3:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and whole wheat toast (without cheese)
- Lunch: Grilled chicken wrap with hummus and sliced cucumber
- Dinner: Baked sweet potato with black beans and salsa (without garlic)

Day 4:
- Breakfast: Avocado toast with a side of fruit salad (without almonds or cashews)
- Lunch: Turkey burger with sweet potato fries and coleslaw (without soy sauce)
- Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted asparagus and quinoa (without garlic)

Day 5:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with mixed berries, spinach, and almond milk (without honey or almonds)
- Lunch: Tuna salad sandwich with whole wheat bread and avocado
- Dinner: Baked sweet potato with black beans and salsa (without garlic)

Day 6:
- Breakfast: Avocado toast with a side of fruit salad (without almonds or cashews)
- Lunch: Grilled chicken wrap with hummus and sliced cucumber
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and quinoa (without garlic)

Day 7:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and whole wheat toast (without cheese)
- Lunch: Tuna salad sandwich with whole wheat bread and avocado
- Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables and quinoa (without garlic)
